definitions.definition: An Israelite judge in the Old Testament who performed feats of strength against the Philistines but was betrayed by Delilah his mistress .
A male given name from Hebrew .
An English surname derived from the given name, or from Samuel + son .

main_definition: ( biblical ) An Israelite judge in the Old Testament who performed feats of strength against the Philistines but was betrayed by Delilah his mistress .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Any very strong man.
A male given name from Hebrew .
An English surname derived from the given name, or from Samuel + son .
